The claim made by U: S. Senator Marco Rubio that U.S. Representative Patrick Murphy "has trouble with the truth."
Findings by the Miami Herald: Tampa Bay Times that Murphy's congressional office and Senate campaign websites initially claimed he had "degrees in accounting and finance" from the University of Miami, while in reality, he had a single degree with majors in accounting and finance.
Murphy: s campaign spokesperson acknowledging that the embellishments were unintentional and that the campaign had updated the language on their websites to reflect a single degree.
